results.title: The Genie from down under: wishing and hoping
results.creator_credit: Esben Storm, Phil Jones, Patricia Edgar, British Broadcasting Corporation, ABC-TV (Australia) and Australian Children's Television Foundation
results.brief_description: When upper class English girl Penelope Townes finds a magic opal which contains two Australian genies, Bruce and his son Baz, she thinks all her problems are over, and that she can have anything she wants. Bruce, however, has other ideas.
results.title_for_label: The Genie from down under: wishing and hoping
results.creator_credit_for_label: Esben Storm, Phil Jones, Patricia Edgar, British Broadcasting Corporation, ABC-TV (Australia) and Australian Children’s Television Foundation

results.title: The Genie from down under: larceny
results.creator_credit: Brendan Maher, Phil Jones, Patricia Edgar, British Broadcasting Corporation, ABC-TV (Australia) and Australian Children's Television Foundation
results.brief_description: Bruce helps Otto and Conrad get the opal because he thinks they will help him return to Australia. Instead, the von Meisters sell it for 25,000 pounds. It’s now up to the genies to sort the mess out.
results.creator_credit_for_label: Brendan Maher, Phil Jones, Patricia Edgar, British Broadcasting Corporation, ABC-TV (Australia) and Australian Children’s Television Foundation

results.title: That special look
results.brief_description: A father’s special look, his wise and knowing words, his love for his family. This is a dedication from a daughter to her dad.

results.title: The Genie from downunder. - Vol. 3.
results.creator_credit: Esben Storm, Brendan Maher, Phil Jones, Patricia Edgar and Australian Children's Television Foundation
results.brief_description: From the producers of “Round the twist” and “Skytrackers”, two more episodes in the adventures of Penelope Townes and the two genies she found in an opal - Bruce and his son Baz - “Larceny”’ and “The Eternal quadrangle.”

results.title: Shining star
results.brief_description: A dedication to the women in my life who have allowed me to be who I am - my mother, my sisters, my children and my best friends.

results.title: The Genie from down under: customs
results.creator_credit: Jeremy Swan, Phil Jones, Patricia Edgar, British Broadcasting Corporation, ABC-TV (Australia) and Australian Children's Television Foundation
results.brief_description: Penelope, Lady Diana and Miss Mossop are arrested by a Customs Officer when they return to England with 20 million pounds provided by the genies. That exact amount has just gone missing from the Royal Mint.
results.creator_credit_for_label: Jeremy Swan, Phil Jones, Patricia Edgar, British Broadcasting Corporation, ABC-TV (Australia) and Australian Children’s Television Foundation

results.title: Letters home
results.brief_description: Sue’s great grandfather, Elisha Morgan, fought in the American Civil War but today all the family has left are three photographs, some letters, an obituary and a sword.

results.title: Just us
results.brief_description: Karli and Elmo grew up together. They went to the same schools, shared good times and bad times, and when things went wrong, there was always each other.
